mainContent.heading: What is the Collection Showcase Section?
paragraphs: The Collection Showcase section allows you to present multiple product collections in a structured and visually balanced layout.

It helps customers quickly browse different collections while keeping your storefront organized and easy to navigate. This makes it ideal for highlighting best sellers, new arrivals, or curated product groups.
The section blends seamlessly into any Shopify theme and focuses on clarity, usability, and a polished storefront experience.

features.title: Typography Settings

features.title: Image Styling

features.title: Content Tabs

features.title: Layout & Spacing
